title: Vengeance is Mine
description: #1 Bestselling Erotic Thriller From USA Today bestselling author, Kasey Millstead, comes a tale that will leave you gripping the edge of your seat as you live the life of Ella Moore. What would you do if you were given the opportunity to avenge the death of your family? Would you sit back and let justice take its course, meaning those responsible are never held accountable? Or, would you do everything you could to seek retribution? Right or wrong, I chose revenge. But, what happens when not everyone is who you thought they were? Sometimes, even the best-laid intentions don’t go to plan… My name is Ella Moore. Vengeance will be mine. Vengeance is Mine is a full length, standalone novel with a Happy Ever After *Mature content for ages 18+
author: Kasey Millstead
